home.name: Andrés Zapata Mazo
home.title: Full Stack Developer
home.description: I create exceptional digital experiences that combine attractive design with efficient functionality. Passionate about solving problems through clean and elegant code.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Get to know me better
about.description: As a Full Stack Developer with extensive experience in web development, I focus on creating intuitive and powerful digital solutions. With a solid foundation in both front-end and back-end technologies, I enjoy taking on complex challenges and transforming them into elegant, user-centered applications.
about.additionalInfo: I'm constantly learning and staying up-to-date with the latest technologies and best practices in the industry. I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and creating intuitive user experiences.
about.education1Description: Course focused on backend development and programming fundamentals.
about.education2Institution: La Escuela Superior de Administración Pública
about.education2Description: Diploma specializing in data science fundamentals and applications.
about.education3Description: Comprehensive course covering modern web development technologies and practices.
about.education4Description: Bachelor's Degree in Sound Engineering, covering audio technology, acoustics, and sound design.
about.experience1Description: Development and maintenance of applications and automations using React, Redux, JavaScript, Node.js, and Cypress for scalable web platforms. Designed database models with Prisma ORM and integrated AWS services (ECS, S3, Lambda, CodeCommit, Amplify, CloudWatch). Implemented CI/CD pipelines.
about.experience2Description: Development, design, maintenance, deployment, and testing of Front End and Back End for various web platforms using agile methodologies. Additionally, requirement analysis, data quality analysis, and documentation development for projects including Observatorio ICFES, AppUI Comptroller General, and more.
about.experience3Description: Developed Front End and Back End for a web platform in React.js with user interfaces, scheduling, and academic records. Supported requirements gathering for the University of Antioquia, using MySQL databases. Maintained a PHP-based platform.
about.experience4Description: Development of Front End and Back End for the University of Antioquia's editorial office platform in Angular. This includes user interfaces by type, product inventory, accounting module, report generation, and alert messaging, with MySQL relational databases.
about.experience5Description: Developed and maintained the web platform for the registration and characterization of alert situations in Medellín. Built using VUE.js with responsive design in Bootstrap, and Node.js for the Back End, based on TypeScript.
about.experience6Description: Developed Front End and Back End for new population characterization features in Antioquia's web platform and mobile app on the Play Store. Built using Angular, .NET, and Node.js for the backend.
about.experience7Description: Led, coordinated, evaluated, and managed the engineering and development area for audio, video, programming, and automation projects, with a focus on UX/UI.
about.experience8Description: Developed, designed, programmed, and led audio, video, and UX/UI automation projects.
about.experience9Description: Directed, developed, modeled, rendered, simulated, designed, and evaluated architectural acoustics projects, noise studies, and noise control projects. Coordinating and supervising carpentry, electro-luminous, and finishes.

global.thankYouVisit: Thank you for visiting my portfolio! 🎉 I'm glad you're here!
global.thankYouBottom: Thank you for reaching the end! 🎉 I hope you found my portfolio interesting. Have a great day! 🚀
